content.question: The piano accompaniment in measure 20 includes which of the following types of nonharmonic tones?

unit.text: 6: Harmony and Voice Leading III - Embellishments, Motives, and Melodic Devices

topic.text: 6.4: Embellishing Tones - Identifying and Writing Suspensions; Identifying Retardations

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in notated music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
